content: MFT-CP Cassette support profile Support profile for cassette system ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Profiles- - - ### FEATURES:Features Labor saving – optimized design help to lower your total cost of installation Engineering support available – contact your local Hilti team for project-specific advice on optimizing the ventilated façade substructure Total system solution – from Hilti you get optimized tools, consumables and services for every step of ventilated façade installation Applications Support profile for hooked cassette (liner tray) facades in combination with an aluminum bolt and a fastening clip Support profile mounted on a horizontal substructure Vertical profile mounted on a horizontal support profile ### TECHNICAL DATA: Width: 110 mm Length: 6000 mm Material composition: EN AW-6063 T66 Technical Data | Height | 40 mm | Width | 110 mm | Length | 6000 mm | Material composition | EN AW-6063 T66 | Material thickness | 1.9 mm ### ITEMS- 2030616 - Cassette profile MFT-CP 80x40 6m - Package Size 6 m - 2030617 - Cassette profile MFT-CP T 80x40 6m - Package Size 6 m
